sn8.3:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā vaṅgīso āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhiṁ.
sn8.3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā vaṅgīso attano paṭibhānena aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati.
sn8.3:1.4: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ;
sn8.3:1.5: yvāhaṁ attano paṭibhānena aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññāmī”ti.
sn8.3:1.6: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso attanāva attano vippaṭisāraṁ uppādetvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
